head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate of Expenditure during the Quarter ending ¶ ¶ 30th June ¶ ¶ ...

div.p: J76/5547, unit 877, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: Form completedby G. Luehmann and signed by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate of Expenditure during the Quarter ending 30th June 1876.
In M to J. MacPherson,9May 1876,M had requested that the transferbe made to this budget heading.

cell.p:
Total — Fifty pounds
shillings and
pence .
